message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I know it would be very valuable for you.  I'm thinking of a price around $14,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I really like the product, but I have a budget to stick to. Can we meet in the middle at $12,000?
I understand you have a budget, Bob, but $10,000 is quite a bit lower than I'd be willing to go.  How about we split the difference at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit far from $13,000. I'd be willing to meet you at $11,500. Can we talk about it?
